actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to clarify the eligibility of high school students to receive Pandemic Unemployment Compensation, and for other purposes.
short_title: High School Student Unemployment Eligibility Clarification Act of 2020
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text: High School Student Unemployment Eligibility Clarification Act of 2020 This bill makes students attending, participating in distance learning through, or on vacation from a secondary school eligible for pandemic unemployment assistance. Such assistance is generally available to individuals who are otherwise ineligible for other unemployment compensation and unable to work as a result of COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019).

titles.title: High School Student Unemployment Eligibility Clarification Act of 2020
